channel.title: Best way to punish criminals?
channel.description:
Imagine a serial killer. One that doesn't care if he kills a 90 year old aids patient or a 2 year old. He gets caught, and (if American) is sentenced to death. Everybody happy, including the killer because he won't have any pain. Or not? Don't you think he gets away with it too easy? My solution: Torture!
You might think: what a fucktard, we don't do that anymore. It's way too cruel. But don't you think they deserve to feel pain too? A few weeks in a punishment camp and a killer will feel sorry. After a good torture session, put him to work in a labour camp. That way he has a use, and can pay back the costs he made when he was in jail.
"You can't treat a human as an animal", some people say. But don't you think a serial killer thinks about that when he is doing his thing?
A terrorist. Their goal is to kill as many infidels as possible, and then die so they go to paradise. Won't he feel fucked up if he doesn't die?
Discuss...

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

We are against those rights, because those who should get punished didn’t care about those rights either.

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:28, topic:236482”]Torture is barbaric. It belongs in countries like Iraq and Africa. We only reserve that for terrorists as a means of obtaining information.

Torturing a person would bring us down to their level. Would any of you do that? I doubt it. Death penalty is good in its own right, but what happens when the person is actually innocent? The last bloke hanged in Australia was innocent.
I think life in prison is the right way to go about it.[/quote]
No one should get Tortured or killed, and by killing a person that have killed another will also bring US down to their level.
And why are so many here agaist the Human rigths?

Read full topic

Torturing a person would bring us down to their level. Would any of you do that? I doubt it. Death penalty is good in its own right, but what happens when the person is actually innocent? The last bloke hanged in Australia was innocent.
I think life in prison is the right way to go about it.[/quote]You forgot America.

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:28, topic:236482”]Torture is barbaric. It belongs in countries like Iraq and Africa. We only reserve that for terrorists as a means of obtaining information.

Torturing a person would bring us down to their level. Would any of you do that? I doubt it. Death penalty is good in its own right, but what happens when the person is actually innocent? The last bloke hanged in Australia was innocent.
I think life in prison is the right way to go about it.[/quote]

Like I said, in some cases torturing isn’t right. But some people deserve it. And for those who don’t deserve it, but still are fucked up should be put in a labour camp, and with that I don’t mean making registration plates.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?

@lothy wrote:

Torture is barbaric. It belongs in countries like Iraq and Africa. We only reserve that for terrorists as a means of obtaining information.

Torturing a person would bring us down to their level. Would any of you do that? I doubt it. Death penalty is good in its own right, but what happens when the person is actually innocent? The last bloke hanged in Australia was innocent.
I think life in prison is the right way to go about it.

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

No, it’s their own damn fault, not society. Don’t tell me I’m responsible for Rictoo killing his wife and kids someday just because he doesn’t have friends and gets picked on a lot.

I grew up with Alopecia Areata, so I had my share of ‘bullying’ as a kid. But seeing as I’m normal and not fucked in the head, I’m not out killing people.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

You want people to die [AKA murderers]. Murderers want people to die. Ahhh… the obvious. Does that make sense now?

Don’t you bully people? Isn’t it your fault for fking that person up for life? You think people are born as a murderer, rapist, terrorist, etc?
We are ALL humans. I know, it’s crazy. We must take responsibility as a whole.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

How are you hating yourself? That makes no sense.

Unid H4x0r:

On a serious level, you know how sick you guys are sounding? Seriously, we as a society are responsible. Isn’t that what causes all robber[ies] and murders[er]?

How are we responsible? Some people are fucked in the head and I’m not responsible for their actions.

Read full topic

Do you hate murderers?
If so: hating yourself is not funny.
If not: good for you.
I wish I could have just written it as an if-else statement.

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I think whatever they did to their victims should be done to them.

The best would be from an ‘Outer Limits’ I saw once, they had a computer to hook people up to to make them dream what the computer said. So murderers were killed the same way they killed, over and over and over again, with all the pain and everything, just to wake up the next day and relive the experience over again. The judge would sentence them to so many hundred deaths. That would be excellent.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:8, topic:236482”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=312083.msg2487410#msg2487410 date=1223924386]

I do think serial killers have it too easy in countries with the death penalty, they kill someone, they die, and guess what?
They don’t care, as dieing is better than life in prison.

On the other hand, I think torture is too extreme, although forced labour would be good

If you call that easy too just die, you should know how it is in Norway.
You can max get 21 years if you kill anyone, and most of the time you get less.
And there is 4 times more murder in US than in Norway.
And the prisons are better than in US.

So there is no connection between Death penatly and number of murder.
[/quote]
Sentenced to life here means 20 years in prison, and usually shorter if you behave well.
But still, if they change prisons to be much tougher, by having forced labour and all that, it’d still be better than the death penalty.
Also, they need to bring back the life-long sentence.[/quote]
Netherland you come from?
I compared it to American laws, not european.

It look like American punishment is about revenge, arent the US you can get more than 100 years in prison, or more than one Death Sentence?

I’am thinking just punishment is wrong, it should be easier to start a new life after prison.
If a man/woman, get out of prison, and are not able to get a job or money, its very easy to get crimminal again, self if the punishment is bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to punish criminals?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:7, topic:236482”][quote author=sppt link=topic=312083.msg2487339#msg2487339 date=1223922730]
I do think serial killers have it too easy in countries with the death penalty, they kill someone, they die, and guess what?
They don’t care, as dieing is better than life in prison.

On the other hand, I think torture is too extreme, although forced labour would be good
[/quote]
If you call that easy too just die, you should know how it is in Norway.
You can max get 21 years if you kill anyone, and most of the time you get less.
And there is 4 times more murder in US than in Norway.
And the prisons are better than in US.

So there is no connection between Death penatly and number of murder.[/quote]
Sentenced to life here means 20 years in prison, and usually shorter if you behave well.
But still, if they change prisons to be much tougher, by having forced labour and all that, it’d still be better than the death penalty.
Also, they need to bring back the life-long sentence.

Read full topic
